tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Swati is friendly and at the same time, she maintain the standard of dealing with patients. She made normal delivery to both of my son.  She gives optimal time to her patients and explain things well. I recommend her to anyone looking for the normal delivery and proper routine check up during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review: My search stopped at Dr. Swati Sinha. She really encoraged me for normal delivery. She listen to the problem and explains health matters in detail. I have consulted many doctors before coming to her, I would say that she was actually a blessing on me and my son.

tags: None
review:
I had the most horrible experience with Dr Swati Sinha and some junior consultant Priya Sidhwani when I went with labor pain to Sitaram Bhartiya. I was in latent labor and was given pains for 12 hours.. me and my family kept on pleading to operate..But doctors kept on waiting for normal delivery. They got to know that baby has passed stool, as their was thick meconium discharge..Even after that they made us wsit for 3 more hours before operating. Not only that, they made me jump on the maternity ball.. while my baby wad in dirty water. 

******* ** **** ***** *** ****** ******** ** **  ***** ***** ** **** *** ** ************* was put on ventilator upon birth as he had swallowed meconium because of which he had respiratory distress and was in NICU was 23 plus days. *** **** * ********* ******* **** ** **** * *** **** *** **** ********* ****** ** *** **** **** * *********** My little one had to go through so much pain.. so many medicines, injections..Just after birth. Emotional trauma which me and my family had to go through is something which cannot be explained in words. And not to forget the financial burden this caused us. ** *** **** * ******* ********* *** ********** ****** ***** ** ***** ******* ****** ****** ***** ******* ********** *********** *****

tags: None
review: Dr Sinha is a well meaning doctor, however, I would not recommend going to Dr Sinha for high risk pregnancy because she to save time did not share sufficient information with me on my condition, and because of Dr Sinha's postponing my surgery, I finally had to undergo an emergency procedure in which I nearly lost my life.

tags: None
review: My both child had borne in her supervision two years ago. She give good suggestion, advice and medicine.

tags: None
review:
** ***** ** **** **** ******. I trust her and she is very honest and caring.
I know her since few years and very comfortable with her .
